content:
Join us to for a listening session focusing on Australia, Indian Sub-Continent and Middle East Listening Session - Thursday, 21 October at 10 am UTC ( 6 am ET).

Talk with HL7 International's board chair about assistance that would be beneficial such as:
• Educational support and domain expertise
• Establishing a relationship with government agency
Expert speakers including Grahame Grieve, the creator of HL7 FHIR, will address:
• National implementation projects and use of FHIR in their regions
• Their country’s approach to COVID

All speakers:
Walter Suarez , HL7 International Board Chair – Re-envisioning project
Grahame Grieve (AUS)
Peter Jordan (NZ)
Kate Ebrill, Brett Esler (AUS)
Chandil Kumar, Vivek Mahadevan (IND)
Rath Panyowat (Thailand)
Osama Elhassan

View the agenda and register (free): https://hl7-org.zoom.us/meeting/register/tJcpcempqzwrEtW_T6qdHmNT3Aq7p9UUFENf
